title: How to install after compiling with Ninja?
body: In the [instructions](//github.com/libuv/libuv#using-ninja), you only provide how to generate and build with ninja. Actully, how do I install LibUV after building it with ninja? There is no `ninja install`.
author: concatime

comments.body:
Short answer is "you don't" - ninja is a build tool, not a packaging tool.

Use autotools if you want install functionality.  GYP+ninja is predominantly for projects where libuv is embedded as a component in a larger project, such as in Node.js.
